verses.esv: 9 because, if you confess with your mouth that Jesus is Lord and believe in your heart that God raised him from the dead, you will be saved.
verses.kjv: 9 That if thou shalt confess with thy mouth the Lord Jesus, and shalt believe in thine heart that God hath raised him from the dead, thou shalt be saved.
verses.niv: 9 That if you confess with your mouth, "Jesus is Lord," and believe in your heart that God raised him from the dead, you will be saved.

verses.esv: 16 “For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.
verses.kjv: 16 For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
verses.niv: 16 "For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.

verses.esv: 23 For the wages of sin is death, but the free gift of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus our Lord.
verses.kjv: 23 For the wages of sin is death; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord.
verses.niv: 23 For the wages of sin is death, but the gift of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus our Lord.

verses.esv: 38 And Peter said to them, “Repent and be baptized every one of you in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins, and you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.
verses.kjv: 38 Then Peter said unto them, Repent, and be baptized every one of you in the name of Jesus Christ for the remission of sins, and ye shall receive the gift of the Holy Ghost.
verses.niv: 38 Peter replied, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

verses.esv: 23 for all have sinned and fall short of the glory of God,
verses.kjv: 23 For all have sinned, and come short of the glory of God;
verses.niv: 23 for all have sinned and fall short of the glory of God,

verses.esv: 12 But to all who did receive him, who believed in his name, he gave the right to become children of God,
verses.kjv: 12 But as many as received him, to them gave he power to become the sons of God, even to them that believe on his name:
verses.niv: 12 Yet to all who received him, to those who believed in his name, he gave the right to become children of God--

verses.esv: 9 If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
verses.kjv: 9 If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
verses.niv: 9 If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just and will forgive us our sins and purify us from all unrighteousness.

verses.esv: 6 Jesus said to him, “I am the way, and the truth, and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.
verses.kjv: 6 Jesus saith unto him, I am the way, the truth, and the life: no man cometh unto the Father, but by me.
verses.niv: 6 Jesus answered, "I am the way and the truth and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.

verses.esv: 12 And there is salvation in no one else, for there is no other name under heaven given among men by which we must be saved.”
verses.kjv: 12 Neither is there salvation in any other: for there is none other name under heaven given among men, whereby we must be saved.
verses.niv: 12 Salvation is found in no one else, for there is no other name under heaven given to men by which we must be saved."

verses.esv: 20 Behold, I stand at the door and knock. If anyone hears my voice and opens the door, I will come in to him and eat with him, and he with me.
verses.kjv: 20 Behold, I stand at the door, and knock: if any man hear my voice, and open the door, I will come in to him, and will sup with him, and he with me.
verses.niv: 20 Here I am! I stand at the door and knock. If anyone hears my voice and opens the door, I will come in and eat with him, and he with me.

verses.esv: 8 but God shows his love for us in that while we were still sinners, Christ died for us.
verses.kjv: 8 But God commendeth his love toward us, in that, while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us.
verses.niv: 8 But God demonstrates his own love for us in this: While we were still sinners, Christ died for us.

verses.esv: 13 For “everyone who calls on the name of the Lord will be saved.”
verses.kjv: 13 For whosoever shall call upon the name of the Lord shall be saved.
verses.niv: 13 for, "Everyone who calls on the name of the Lord will be saved."

verses.esv: 31 And they said, “Believe in the Lord Jesus, and you will be saved, you and your household.”
verses.kjv: 31 And they said, Believe on the Lord Jesus Christ, and thou shalt be saved, and thy house.
verses.niv: 31 They replied, "Believe in the Lord Jesus, and you will be saved--you and your household."

verses.esv: 9 The Lord is not slow to fulfill his promise as some count slowness, but is patient toward you, not wishing that any should perish, but that all should reach repentance.
verses.kjv: 9 The Lord is not slack concerning his promise, as some men count slackness; but is longsuffering to us-ward, not willing that any should perish, but that all should come to repentance.
verses.niv: 9 The Lord is not slow in keeping his promise, as some understand slowness. He is patient with you, not wanting anyone to perish, but everyone to come to repentance.

verses.esv: 17 Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation. The old has passed away; behold, the new has come.
verses.kjv: 17 Therefore if any man be in Christ, he is a new creature: old things are passed away; behold, all things are become new.
verses.niv: 17 Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation; the old has gone, the new has come!

verses.esv: 16 Whoever believes and is baptized will be saved, but whoever does not believe will be condemned.
verses.kjv: 16 He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved; but he that believeth not shall be damned.
verses.niv: 16 Whoever believes and is baptized will be saved, but whoever does not believe will be condemned.

verses.esv: 23 Now may the God of peace himself sanctify you completely, and may your whole spirit and soul and body be kept blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.
verses.kjv: 23 And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.
verses.niv: 23 May God himself, the God of peace, sanctify you through and through. May your whole spirit, soul and body be kept blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.esv: 26 for in Christ Jesus you are all sons of God, through faith.
verses.kjv: 26 For ye are all the children of God by faith in Christ Jesus.
verses.niv: 26 You are all sons of God through faith in Christ Jesus,

verses.esv: 36 Whoever believes in the Son has eternal life; whoever does not obey the Son shall not see life, but the wrath of God remains on him.
verses.kjv: 36 He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life: and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life; but the wrath of God abideth on him.
verses.niv: 36 Whoever believes in the Son has eternal life, but whoever rejects the Son will not see life, for God's wrath remains on him."

verses.esv: 21   And it shall come to pass that everyone who calls upon the name of the Lord shall be saved.’
verses.kjv: 21 And it shall come to pass, that whosoever shall call on the name of the Lord shall be saved.
verses.niv: 21 And everyone who calls on the name of the Lord will be saved.'

verses.esv: 5:1 Therefore, since we have been justified by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ.
verses.kjv: 1 Therefore being justified by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ:
verses.niv: 1 Therefore, since we have been justified through faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ,

verses.esv: 5 he saved us, not because of works done by us in righteousness, but according to his own mercy, by the washing of regeneration and renewal of the Holy Spirit,
verses.kjv: 5 Not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us, by the washing of regeneration, and renewing of the Holy Ghost;
verses.niv: 5 he saved us, not because of righteous things we had done, but because of his mercy. He saved us through the washing of rebirth and renewal by the Holy Spirit,

verses.esv: 8 For by grace you have been saved through faith. And this is not your own doing; it is the gift of God, 9 not a result of works, so that no one may boast.
verses.kjv: 8 For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God: 9 Not of works, lest any man should boast.
verses.niv: 8 For it is by grace you have been saved, through faith--and this not from yourselves, it is the gift of God-- 9 not by works, so that no one can boast.

verses.esv: 7 Therefore welcome one another as Christ has welcomed you, for the glory of God.
verses.kjv: 7 Wherefore receive ye one another, as Christ also received us to the glory of God.
verses.niv: 7 Accept one another, then, just as Christ accepted you, in order to bring praise to God.

verses.esv: 9 because, if you confess with your mouth that Jesus is Lord and believe in your heart that God raised him from the dead, you will be saved. 10 For with the heart one believes and is justified, and with the mouth one confesses and is saved.
verses.kjv: 9 That if thou shalt confess with thy mouth the Lord Jesus, and shalt believe in thine heart that God hath raised him from the dead, thou shalt be saved. 10 For with the heart man believeth unto righteousness; and with the mouth confession is made unto salvation.
verses.niv: 9 That if you confess with your mouth, "Jesus is Lord," and believe in your heart that God raised him from the dead, you will be saved. 10 For it is with your heart that you believe and are justified, and it is with your mouth that you confess and are saved.
